verbs.description: The U.S. campaign to [ARGM-MNR: economically] [V: isolate] [ARG1: North Korea] will continue , the White House press secretary said Monday , even as preparations advance for President Donald Trump ’s summit next week with Kim Jong Un .

The U.S. campaign to economically isolate North Korea [V: will] continue , the White House press secretary said Monday , even as preparations advance for President Donald Trump ’s summit next week with Kim Jong Un .
